name: Astrovers
description:
After a crash in a new galaxy, you have to help an astronaut reach the emergency planet.

Reach to 100 percent the pression of the planet by interacting with some objects of the environment.

This game was made during a 3 Axes Institut's 5 days Game Jam with the theme Small World by 7 first year students.

Made by :

LÉCLUSE Théo, VAN-OPPEN Aurélien, BECUWE Allan, FAUQUEMBERGUE Hugo, ROELENS Tom, VAJOU Grégoire, LAFFORGUE M.Edouard
